page.title: 11SERVICES FOR NEWQUAY (2)
page.content: Mr. Hicks did farm 85 acres but now has only 20 acres, keeping bullocks and growing corn, hay,and potatoes.The main machinery used includes tracters, ploughs, rollers, cultivators rotavators and planters which are owned. Tregenna camp site has been open since 1953. People use caravans more then tents as they are so convenient for a holiday. At the camp site they have many facilities such as three swimming pools,a disco,shops,amusements,golf, toilets,telephones and T.V. The camp site covers 26.5 acres, and it costs Â£149 per week to stay there in July and Â£169 in Agust,which is the peak holiday period. People stay there for a week on average.
